sub_title: Training Consultant for the Pharmaceutical Research Industry
summary:
I am a creative, driven, experienced research professional in pharmaceutical and device trials. I have strong leadership and management skills. I am looking to further my career in a training and management role. I previously have 2 years of direct management experience and over 9 years of managing large study teams.

Specialties: My research experience includes: Alzheimer's, Fibromyalgia, Restless Leg Syndrome, Pseudobulbar Effect (IEED), Hypogonadism, Type I Gaucher's Disease, Huntington's, Peripheral Neuropathy in Spinal Cord Injury Patients, Calcification of Vitamin D in End Stage Renal Failure, Depression, Reading Comprehension and Eye Movement, Facial Recognition and Gender Identification, Nephrology, Anemia, Vitamin D Deficiency Rheumatoid Arthritis, Oncology and Cardiology.
